title: Research Skills Development Simulation Training for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer and smartphone usage skills, along with general understanding of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based constrained technical environments, focusing on internalizing research skills through simulation cases linked to real-life contexts

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given social issues to formulate specific research questions.
Learners can systematically organize and interpret data collected in simulation environments.
Learners can effectively communicate research findings in multiple formats (text, audio, images).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
